title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter on a table containing a datetime column, an error message is thrown.
OB: An error message is thrown when trying to use the value new Date("3/2/2005") as a filter on a table containing a datetime column.
EB: The value new Date("3/2/2005") should be accepted as a valid filter on a table containing a datetime column.
SR: 1. Create a new datasource and dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table into the report. 3. Create a filter based on the datetime column. 4. In the filter value field, enter new Date("3/2/2005").
